title: Dear Forum Mods
body:
Will i be receiving a response to why my post about ARAM was deleted? 

Dont know which forum i can post this too so im posting it here.

replies.body: There aren't any mod actions on your account. The post is marked as deleted but it wasn't done by a mod. Either it didn't post correctly, or you deleted it yourself by accident. Since it's your post you should still be able to view it and copy paste to repost if you like: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/FjGAIbRv/d/MGhs8b2U

You should have received an explanation in the deletion notification (which you can access from the icon with the exclamation mark in the top right of the site). The explanation will generally specify which of the boards rules was breach, and possibly why it's not appropriate to breach that rule.
